dmca.title: Case ID 152588019 - Notice of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Marianne Henderson [mailto:mhenderson@safenet-inc.com] 
Posted At: Friday, June 30, 2006 11:40 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Case ID 152588019 - Notice of Claimed Infringement
Subject: RE: Case ID 152588019 - Notice of Claimed Infringement


Legal Response Team,

Thank-you for your response.  In determining IP ownership we reference the publicly
available information in the ARIN database.  Currently you are registered as the
legally responsible entity for 70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255 which includes
70.85.176.229.  

If this information is incorrect or no longer current, would you please let us know
as soon as possible? That way we can make any necessary updates to our records and
future communications can be sent to the appropriate parties.  I will wait to hear
from you further before making any changes.

Best Regards,

Marianne Henderson
Enforcement Coordinator
MediaSentry Services, SafeNet Inc. 
3100 Research Boulevard, Suite 360
Kettering, Ohio 45420, USA
(937) 425-6860 Ext: 4514
 

-----Original Message-----
From: Copyright [mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com]
Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2006 5:36 PM
To: infringements@hbo.com
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: FW: Case ID 152588019 - Notice of Claimed Infringement

 Please note that the IP address referenced in your DMCA notice does not reside
within our network as of 4:35:43 p.m. (GMT-6) on June 28, 2006.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet

-----Original Message-----
From: CopyrightInfringement [mailto:infringements@hbo.com] Posted At:
Wednesday, June 21, 2006 8:46 AM Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Case ID 152588019 - Notice of Claimed Infringement
Subject: Case ID 152588019 - Notice of Claimed Infringement


Wednesday, June 21, 2006


ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207  US


RE:  Unauthorized Distribution of the Copyrighted Television Program Entitled
     Dane Cook's Tourgasm


Dear George Poletes:

We are writing this letter on behalf of Home Box Office, Inc. ("HBO").

We have received information  leading us to belief that an individual has utilized
the above-referenced IP address at the noted date and time to offer downloads of
copyrighted television program(s) through a "peer-to-peer"
service, including such title(s) as:

     Dane Cook's Tourgasm

The distribution of unauthorized copies of copyrighted television programs
constitutes copyright infringement under the Copyright Act, Title 17 United States
Code Section 106(3).  

Since you own this IP address, we request that you immediately do the
following:

1) Disable access to the individual who has engaged in the conduct described above;
and/or
2) Take other appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse
Policy/Terms of Service Agreement.

On behalf of HBO, owner of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted material at issue
in this notice, we hereby state, that we have a good faith belief that use of the
material in the manner complained of is not authorized by HBO, its respective
agents, or the law.

Also, we hereby state, under penalty of perjury, under the laws of the State of New
York and under the laws of the United States, that the information in this
notification is accurate and that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owner of
the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification.

Please direct any end user queries to the following address:

Steve Rosenthal
Legal Department
Home Box Office, Inc.
1100 Avenue of the Americas
New York, NY  10036
212.512.1780 - phone
212.512.5854 - fax
infringements@hbo.com - email

Kindly include the Case ID 152588019, also noted above, in the subject line of all
future correspondence regarding this matter.

We appreciate your assistance and thank you for your cooperation in this matter.
Your prompt response is requested.

Respectfully,

Marianne Henderson
Enforcement Coordinator
SafeNet, Inc.



------------------------------
Infringement Detail:

Tracker IP: 66.228.115.248
Tracker Port: 80
Tracker URL:
http://tracker2.bt-chat.com/announce?info_hash=%3Aj%F0%248%7B%F9%9C%C6g%E9%B
3v%AA%AD%23pd%2A%A8&peer_id=M4-0-1--185759311690&port=7882&uploaded=48340582
&downloaded=0&left=241702912&event=started&numwant=100&compact=1

Infringing Work: Dane Cook's Tourgasm
Filepath: Dane.Cooks.Tourgasm.S01E02.HDTV.XviD-SAiNTS.avi.torrent
Filename: Dane.Cooks.Tourgasm.S01E02.HDTV.XviD-SAiNTS.avi
First Found: 20 Jun 2006 19:11:57 EDT (GMT -0400) Last Found: 20 Jun 2006
19:11:57 EDT (GMT -0400)
Filesize: 236,038k
IP Address: 70.85.176.229
IP Port: 1025
Network: BTPeers
Protocol: BitTorrent



==============================================================================
This e-mail is intended only for the use of the addressees.  Any copying,
forwarding, printing or other use of this e-mail by persons other than the
addressees is not authorized.  This e-mail may contain information that is
privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please notify us immediately by return e-mail (including the original
message in your reply) and then delete and discard all copies of the e-mail.  Thank
you.
dmca.principal_name: SafeNet, Inc. (for Home Box Office, Inc. ("HBO"))
